scripts.publish-major: npm run build && npm version major && git add . && git commit -m "bump major version" --allow-empty && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git add . && git commit -m "bump minor version" --allow-empty && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && git add . && git commit -m "bump patch version" --allow-empty && git push && npm publish
